briefdescription.para: Writes the given integer to the given stream.

parameterdescription.para: The stream where to write to.

briefdescription.para: Writes the given integer as in hexadecimal format into the given stream.

parameterdescription.para: The stream where to write the number to.

briefdescription.para: Writes the given string to the given stream.

parameterdescription.para: A null terminate string to be written.
The stream where to write the string.

briefdescription.para: Writes the given character to the given stream.

parameterdescription.para: The character ascii to be written.
The stream where to write the character to.

briefdescription.para: Reads a string of the given size from the given stream.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to the buffer where to write the string to.
The ammount of bytes to be read.
The stream where to read the string from.

briefdescription.para: Reads a character ascii from the given stream and returns it.

parameterdescription.para: The stream where to read the character from.

simplesect.para: The ascii from the read character.

briefdescription.para: Definitions for all standard input and output and declaration of all functions to send/recive data to/from standar input/output.

simplesect.para: Luciano Zemin, Nicolás Magni, Nicolás Purita
